projectInfo.title: IdGaf Creative
projectInfo.summary: Logo System & Business Cards for modern, bold, production studio
projectInfo.introduction: IdGaf Creative, pronounced /aɪd - gæf/, a production studio experimenting with brand identity, asked for several posters and business card renditions based on their relaxed, bold image.
